titleStmt.title: A seasonable and necessary admonition to the gentlemen of the First Society, for Reformation of Manners Concerning reformation of themselves, of the Bishops, and of the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; with print show-through slightly affecting legibility.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
